 /><3.6K /><  /><views /><RECIPE /><Cook 1cup Chicken fillet with green chilli paste ginger garlic /><Little Dhana Jeeru (Cumin) and any chicken spice with little ghee (Clarified butter) /><Remove when done /><Cool keep aside /><In a Seperate pot /><Heat little oil /><Add 1 small grated onion little garlic torn up small red dry red chilli let it splutter /><Add washed and finely chopped Spinash (I used like 3 cups chopped ) with 1 Chopped or grated Tomato /><Cook till almost done /><Add the cooked chicken fillets /><Add 4 tablespoon chicken soup /><powder (OR 2 tablespoon MAZINA IF NO SOUP POWDER MAKE PASTE WITH LITTLE MILK) /><Add NANDO LEMON AND HERB SAUCE OR PERI PERI OR MAYONNAISE /><For a slight Tangy taste /><Add handful of chopped Green /><dhania (coriander) When done allow to cool /><Add Feta cheese and any other grated cheese to the filling /><Mix well /><
